pages.text: Heals the target based on damage dealt.

pages.title: Leeching
pages.text: The higher the intensity, the more health is healed.$(br2)This effect will not work if you have $(l:bewitchment:brewing/mundane_brews#strength)Strength$(), $(l:bewitchment:brewing/mundane_brews#regeneration)Regeneration$(), or $(l:bewitchment:brewing/mundane_brews#resistance)Resistance.$()
